  ┃
  ┃  $ nix build .#test
  ┃  error: undefined variable 'BASH_SOURCE'
  ┃         at /nix/store/xxx-source/default.nix:15:5
  ┃
  ┃
  ┃  Plan  Claude Sonnet 4.5 (latest) Anthropic                                                                      ~/.config/dotfiles:HEAD
  ╹▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀
   ⬝⬝⬝⬝⬝⬝⬝⬝  esc interrupt                                                      tab switch agent  ctrl+p commands    • OpenCode 1.1.3
